content: when it starts to get chilly in the mornings and you still want to enjoy that first mug of coffee in bed dressing gowns are too bulky to wear what to do introducing - the bed cape the bed cape keeps your neck nice and snug covers your shoulders but you can still move to enjoy your coffee - so good my husband has one too knitted in chunky yarn this can be finnished in a couple of evenings making it a great quick knit you can easily customise your bed cape by adding extra length to the body making it extra snuggly the cape can be knitted using 3 or 4 balls of rowan big wool - depending on how long you would like your cape the pattern covers 2 sizes and is knitted using 10mm needles
